Translation:

Dear journalists,
Far & Son have, through four years of hard work, managed to scrape up enough material for en EP of six songs.
We offer what we do best. Foul language, drugs and a crude sense oh humour. Catchy tunes and stirring catchy rythms that make you want to dance.
Through or lyrics, we seek to normalize a destructive behaviour among the growing generation.
Adolescents with weak minds will understand the brave nature of drug abuse and the cowardice of an education behind themselves.
Children hearing our songs on Spotify will be tempted to try LSD.
We present "The Sushi USB EP". For your amusement and enjoyment.

Far & Son

Note from the translator: Far & Son literally means Father & Son. One does not, however, translate names.
